title: Wisdom and Genius - second sentence implies

content.question: The second sentence (Paragraph 1) implies which of the following conclusions?

choices.label: There are two sides to every issue.
An excess of passion is destructive.
Lasting happiness will always elude us.

content.answer: Lasting happiness will always elude us.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and explain claims and evidence within an argument.
